property.name: objectName
property.description: Alias Name to be used for creating object.

property.name: qmgrSvrconnChannel
property.label: Server connection channel
property.description: The name of a WebSphere MQ svrconn channel to use when connecting to WebSphere MQ.

property.name: qmgrHostname
property.label: Hostname
property.description: The hostname which will be used when attempting a client mode connection to WebSphere MQ.

property.name: qmgrPortNumber
property.label: Port
property.description: The TCP/IP port number used for connection to the WebSphere MQ queue manager, for client connection only.

rule.message: Value should be in the range 0 through 2147483647.

type.description: Specifies a WMQ Activation Specification with CCDT URL. Resource valid only with WAS 7.0 and later application servers.

generate-deployable.description: Specification of a WMQ Activation Specification with CCDT URL. Resource valid only with WAS 8.0 and later application servers.

rule.message: Value should be a number in range of 5 - 180.

property.name: failingMessageDelay
property.description: Delay between failing message retries in milliseconds

type.description: Base for Policy's contained in policy sets
Base for Policy's contained in policy sets
Base for Policy's contained in policy sets
Base for Policy's contained in policy sets

property.label: inbound Service requests SSL Properties Config File

property.label: outbound Service requests SSL Properties Config File

property.description: to which was nodes does this policy pertain
